message.content:
cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.AL, cs.CG, cs.DM 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper presents an algorithmic solution to a combinatorial problem, which is a core topic in this sub-category. 
2. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper mentions applications in networked distributed systems, which suggests a connection to this sub-category. 
3. cs.AL (Computational Complexity) - The paper discusses the computational complexity of the problem and provides an almost complete characterization of what can be solved exactly in polynomial-time, which is a topic in this sub-category. 
4. cs.CG (Computational Geometry) - The problem of finding a shortest walk that includes specified vertices can be seen as a geometric problem, which is a topic in this sub-category. 
5. cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) - The problem of finding a shortest walk that includes specified vertices can be seen as a combinatorial problem, which is a topic in this sub-category.
